title: Marketing Assistant Entry Level NEW!
full_description: Ultara Holdings, Inc. has been building a culture of excellence since 1995. We are a diverse company with business activities ranging from both retail and wholesale distribution and product development and manufacturing. We are an international company with headquarters in Dallas, Texas and our operations are spread across 9 US states and 2 Canadian provinces. GeoShack, Inc., our largest subsidiary, distributes state of the art technology that’s changing the way the world works in construction, surveying, agriculture, landfill, mining and many other fields. GeoShack, Inc. is the largest Topcon dealer worldwide and we pride ourselves on providing the best solutions in positioning and machine control products, installation, support, training, and service to our customers.As we continue to grow in the marketplace, we are looking for a driven Entry Level Marketing Assistant who will work closely with the Marketing and company Management teams to assist in various company marketing endeavors. As a successful hire, you will be tasked with maintaining the company CRM data base, leads distribution and follow-up, event planning, reporting marketing metrics, as well as other marketing endeavors to drive sales and brand awareness.The ideal candidate will have a Bachelor’s degree in marketing, business, or a related field. Prior work experience in administration, sales, or marketing is a plus. Being highly organized, proficient in Microsoft Excel, with a real “CAN DO” attitude are all important keys to success in this role. The position has a lot of variety and requires someone who is knowledgeable, patient, and pays careful attention to details.Responsibilities:Assist in maintaining, organizing and reporting on company CRM data bases Administer, track, and report company’s marketing coop activities.Distribute, Administer, track, and report all sales leads and follow up activitiesTrack and Distribute Marketing AnalyticsWebsites, Social Media and SEOEvent Planning – Such as Trade Shows, Customer Events, Open Houses, Trainings and other events as needed.Updating Company Website CalendarsAssist in monitoring and reporting on active marketing programs and developing ways to improve those campaigns.Assist with Social Media PostingWork closely with retail managers for in-store collateral to be put on retail sales floorsQualifications:Bachelor’s Degree in Business and/or Marketing related field.Ability to multi-task effectively in a fast-paced environmentA “CAN DO” AttitudeExcellent Problem Solving SkillsMust be willing to travel to offsite eventsStrong Communication and organizational skillsWorking knowledge of Social Media Platforms and posting/scheduling programsWorking Knowledge of Word Press Website CMSHighly Proficient in MS Excel and WordBenefits:Competitive SalaryGroup Medical, Dental and Vision Insurance401(k) Retirement with Company MatchEmployer Paid Life InsuranceEmployer Paid Short-term and Long-term DisabilityPaid Time-off and Holiday
